Source.Name: xmlto
Source.Description: xmlto converts XML files to various formats, and at the moment it supports conversion from docbook, xhtml1 and fo format to various output formats (awt, fo, htmlhelp, javahelp, mif, pdf, svg, xhtml, dvi, html, html-nochunks, man , pcl, ps, txt, xhtml-nochunks, epub).

Package.Name: xmlto
Package.Description: xmlto converts XML files to various formats, and at the moment it supports conversion from docbook, xhtml1 and fo format to various output formats (awt, fo, htmlhelp, javahelp, mif, pdf, svg, xhtml, dvi, html, html-nochunks, man , pcl, ps, txt, xhtml-nochunks, epub).
